lead_paragraph: They're racing toward the future and about to grow up fast! In one of her earliest leading roles, OscarÂ(r) nominee* Melanie Griffith ignites the screen in this exhilarating high-speed drama co-starring Desi Arnaz, Jr., Robert Carradine and Anne Loc
